name: Parcel Myr
oracle_text: {2}, Sacrifice Parcel Myr: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Crack it open. Maybe it knows something we can use."
—Kara Vrist, Mirran resistance

name: Recalibrate
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you've discarded a card this turn, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Trial 991: Still encountering issues with accidental aetherization. Maybe if we widen the dimensional matrix to 0.7?"
—Izzet research notes

name: Cabal Initiate
oracle_text:
Discard a card: Cabal Initiate gains lifelink until end of turn.
Threshold — Cabal Initiate get +1/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor_text: "Hear our prayers, oh Shadowed One, and bless us in body agony."

name: Gilt-Blade Prowler
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card. Activate only if you've discarded a card this turn.
flavor_text:
"Let's just say my people are in the business of capital acquisition and intellectual property speculation."
—Er-Miral

name: Hell Mongrel
oracle_text:
Discard a card: Hell Mongrel gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: It feeds on shadows, fear, and blood.

name: Loathsome Curator
oracle_text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
Menace
When Loathsome Curator exploits a creature, destroy target creature you don't control with mana value 3 or less.
flavor_text: She collects only the choicest of deaths.

name: Nested Shambler
oracle_text: When Nested Shambler dies, create X tapped 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens, where X is Nested Shambler's power.
flavor_text: Home is where the heart was.

name: Tizerus Charger
oracle_text:
Escape—{4}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Tizerus Charger escapes with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or a flying counter on it.

name: Tragic Fall
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
Hellbent — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if you have no cards in hand.
flavor_text: Every final journey begins with a single misstep.

name: Vermin Gorger
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Once, vampires ruled this world, commanding the fear and respect that befit our noble blood. Have we truly sunk so low?"
—Sorin Markov

oracle_text:
Menace
Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
Whenever you cast a spell other than your first spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Arcbound Tracker.

name: Gouged Zealot
oracle_text:
Reach
Delirium — Whenever Gouged Zealot attacks, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Gouged Zealot deals 1 damage to each creature defending player controls.
flavor_text: He can't fear what he can't see.

name: Magmatic Sinkhole
oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Magmatic Sinkhole deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Opening like the maw of a hellion, the earth swallowed the traveler whole.

name: Lavabelly Sliver
oracle_text: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 1 life."
flavor_text: Warm enough to incubate eggs or incinerate those who would eat them.

name: Goblin Anarchomancer
oracle_text: Each spell you cast that's red or green costs {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: A good Gruul shaman can work a whole clan into a frenzy. A great one will wait until the enemy's nearby.

oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

oracle_text: Each spell you cast that's red or green costs {1} less to cast.
